CutSceneText.Text: The Arena of Discpline is for one-on-one matches.
Your opponent may be Asmodian or Elyos.
You receive points for defeating your opponent, and the first to earn the target number wins.
The fight consists of three rounds, and you won't suffer from Soul Sickness if you die.
If no one reaches the point target, the winner is the one with more points at the end of three rounds.
